title: GMCH Chandigarh Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Lab Technician Posts
description: Government Medical College and Hospital (GMCH Chandigarh) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Lab Technician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc DMLT can grab this chance and apply for the GMCH Chandigarh Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you...
